data.title: Vidya Balan Wants To Work With Shah Rukh Khan But It Has To Be This Genre
data.meta_description: They worked together in Om Shanti Om
data.text:
Vidya Balan who is gearing up for the release of Do Aur Do Pyaar alongside Pratik Gandhi recently opened up the film and what her plans are for future projects. While talking to India Today she expressed a desire to work with Shah Rukh Khan.

Recalling her short cameo in Om Shanti Om the actress revealed that she would like the chance to work with the superstar once again. The actress had made an appearance as herself in the titular song of the film called Om Shanti Om. It featured her as one of the actresses present at a party throne for SRK's character in the film.

However, this is not the only time they shared screen space together. SRK also made an extended cameo in Vidya Balan's film Heyy Babyy. He had featured as a possible candidate to marry Vidya's character in the film. The two appeared in a song together which also features Anupam Kher, Boman Irani, Ritesh Deshmukh, Akshay Kumar and more.

SEE ALSO: Vidya Balan Praises Ranbir Kapoor's Animal, Says 'You Can Agree Or Disagree' With The Film But It Was 'Entertaining'

The two never had the chance to work together in a full feature film. Talking about which actors she would like to cast together, Balan excitedly said, “I had a very small role in Om Shanti Om.’ But I would want to do a nice love story with him."

Meanwhile, Balan's next Do Aur Do Pyaar also stars Prateek Gandhi, Ileana D’Cruz and Sendhil Ramamurthy in leading roles. The film is set to release this week on the big screen.

Balan has also been confirmed to return in Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3 alongside Kartik Aaryan.
